display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (REM): Apneas with >= 2% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and with >= 2% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal / hour of REM sleep from type II polysomnography
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp2 + hrop2 + carbp2 + carop2 + oarbp2 + oarop2 ) / minremp
